thread.title: Tracy Morgan actually bought a zoo: Watch him shake down a gorilla for money and woo giraffes into lovemaking - Fun
thread.title_full: Tracy Morgan actually bought a zoo: Watch him shake down a gorilla for money and woo giraffes into lovemaking - Fun News - Digital Spy

author: Justin Harp
title: Tracy Morgan actually bought a zoo: Watch him shake down a gorilla for money and woo giraffes into lovemaking - Fun
text: Forget about Matt Damon's fictional movie - Tracy Morgan actually bought a zoo.Now firmly on the comeback trail after his 2014 accident, the comedian recently pooled his financial resources (remember - 30 Rock's in syndication) to give himself the famed Bronx Zoo as a present.Jimmy Kimmel and his sidekick Guillermo Rodriguez dropped by the animal habitat during a New York visit to meet all of Morgan's weird and wonderful friends.Watch the clip above to see Morgan shake down some gorillas for money, buy a few big cats off Craigslist and woo a pair of giraffes into lovemaking.Let the soothing sounds of Marvin Gaye's 'Let's Get It On' wash over you as you observe some sweet, sweet animal love.Jimmy Kimmel Live! airs more hijinks weeknights on ABC.
